janRegular.title: janRegular: Avoid Fame
janRegular.detail: make sure i am not discovered as a new netflix documentary star

janRegular.title: janRegular: spend don's money
janRegular.detail: when i offed carole's husband i made bank. my pride is getting some new cages!

newHampshireWoman.title: newHampshireWoman: look good
newHampshireWoman.detail: get a new tshirt with a bikini airbrushed on the front

newHampshireWoman.title: newHampshireWoman: save for cruise
newHampshireWoman.detail: don't go to dunkie's more than once a day

newHampshireWoman.title: newHampshireWoman: get a new quirky vanity plate
newHampshireWoman.detail: i gotta up my car game.

howeySmith.title: howeySmith: make appearance in 100 coding projects
howeySmith.detail: the minimum to stay on trend is 75. I will be in 100 apps by neat year's end.

howeySmith.title: howeySmith: get better zoom backgrounds than my alter-ego, Michael Howey
howeySmith.detail: he is making a run for my image as the cool one. he will be stopped.

howeySmith.title: howeySmith: remain incognito
howeySmith.detail: i am definitely real, but no one has ever seen me and I like it that way.
